name: Weiss Guy
content: The main core of the surfboard is super fused EPS foam, then it's cut in half and inserted with a PU foam central flex dampener which gives you a core that has liveliness to it and loads of flexy spring. This is then wrapped in two layers of glass on the bottom of the board using a unique tiered lap which gives you unreal flex recoil and a tensile strength 20% stronger than a standard 4oz cloth.

name: The Doofer
content: The main core of the surfboard is super fused EPS foam, then it's cut in half and inserted with a PU foam central flex dampener which gives you a core that has liveliness to it and loads of flexy spring. This is then wrapped in two layers of glass on the bottom of the board using a unique tiered lap which gives you unreal flex recoil and a tensile strength 20% stronger than a standard 4oz cloth.

name: Monster Board
content: This was an awesome experience. Thoroughly enjoyed it.!!

name: Flying Frog
content: This is the best surfboard i have ever ridden. I cant get over the speed and agility for such a froggy looking thing. Will definitely recommend to to surf buddies.
